name: Executioner
desc: Executioners gain Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage. Their Ability can critically strike.

name: Stance Master
desc: When you field Lee Sin, choose between Duelist Stance, Executioner Stance, and Juggernaut Stance! Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin the associated trait.

name: Edgelord
desc: Edgelords gain Omnivamp and Attack Damage. While attacking enemies under @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed.

name: Crystal Gambit
desc: Kills and losses during player combats earn Gem Power. Every @NumCombats@ player combats choose to convert Gem Power into rewards or Double Down.
While Double Down is active losses grant @PercentIncreasedGP*100@% more Gem Power, but wins lose @PercentLost*100@% Gem Power and cash out immediately.
<rules>Gem Power gains increase at stages 3 and 4.</rules>

<row>(@MinUnits@) AND every @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_GemForce_KillRequirement@ kills, gain bonus loot and reroll a new kill number. (Kills: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_GemForce_TotalKills@)</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @7PeiceMult*100@% rewards. Crystal Gambit units gain @7PieceHealth@ %i:scaleHealth% and @7PieceAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%</row>.

name: Sniper
desc: Snipers gain Damage Amp, increased against targets farther away.

name: Star Guardian
desc: Star Guardians have a unique Teamwork bonus that is granted to all Star Guardians. Every Star Guardian fielded increases the bonus!<ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_NoPrismatic>

<ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasSyndra><status>Syndra:</status> Gain @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_SyndraValue@ Ability Power every @SyndraTimer@ seconds</ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasSyndra><ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasSyndra><TFTGuildInactive>Syndra: Gain Ability Power</TFTGuildInactive></ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasSyndra>

<ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasXayah><status>Xayah:</status> Every 3rd attack deals <magicDamage>@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_XayahValue@ (increases per stage)</magicDamage> magic damage</ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasXayah><ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasXayah><TFTGuildInactive>Xayah: Magic damage on attack</TFTGuildInactive></ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasXayah>

<ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasAhri><status>Ahri:</status> After casting, gain @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_AhriValue@ Mana over @AhriDuration@ seconds</ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasAhri><ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasAhri><TFTGuildInactive>Ahri: On cast, gain Mana</TFTGuildInactive></ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasAhri>

<ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasPoppy><status>Poppy:</status> At 40% Health, heal @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_PoppyValue@% %i:scaleHealth%</ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasPoppy><ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasPoppy><TFTGuildInactive>Poppy: Heal at low Health</TFTGuildInactive></ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasPoppy>

<ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasJinx><status>Jinx:</status> +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_JinxValue@% Attack Speed. +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_JinxBonusASValue@% %i:scaleAS% after takedowns, decaying over 3s</ShowIf.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasJinx><ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasJinx><TFTGuildInactive>Jinx: Gain Attack Speed</TFTGuildInactive></ShowIfNot.TFT15_StarGuardian_HasJinx>

name: Heavyweight
desc: Heavyweights gain additional bonus Health, and Attack Damage equal to a percentage of their Health.

name: The Crew
desc: Crew champions gain @StatBonus*100@% Health and Attack Speed for each Crew member fielded.
Every 3-star Crew champion grants an additional bonus.

<tftActiveRank enabled=TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus1Active default=false alternate=TFTGuildInactive>(1x <ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus1Active>%i:3StarEnabled%</ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus1Active><ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus1Active>%i:3StarDisabled%</ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus1Active>): +@XPPerReroll@ XP per paid reroll, and Crew unit odds never drop with player level.</tftActiveRank>

<tftActiveRank enabled=TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus3Active default=false alternate=TFTGuildInactive>(3x <ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus3Active>%i:3StarEnabled%</ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus3Active><ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus3Active>%i:3StarDisabled%</ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus3Active>): Deal @BaseDamageThreshold@ damage to fire a rocket dealing <magicDamage>@BaseRocketDamage@</magicDamage>.</tftActiveRank>

<tftActiveRank enabled=TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus4Active default=false alternate=TFTGuildInactive>(4x <ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus4Active>%i:3StarEnabled%</ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus4Active><ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus4Active>%i:3StarDisabled%</ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus4Active>): Fire rockets @RocketRatePerLevel*100@% more often per player level.</tftActiveRank>

<tftActiveRank enabled=TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus5Active default=false alternate=TFTGuildInactive>(5x <ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus5Active>%i:3StarEnabled%</ShowIf.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus5Active><ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus5Active>%i:3StarDisabled%</ShowIfNot.TFT15_Trait_WildcardCrew_Bonus5Active>): Fire the Planet Cracker.</tftActiveRank>

name: Supreme Cells
desc: The Cell who dealt the most damage last combat is Supreme. When the Supreme Cell dies, the Cell with the highest current damage becomes Supreme.
Cells gain Damage Amp. The Supreme Cell gains more and executes enemies under @OverlordExecute*100@% Health.

name: Soul Fighter
desc: Soul Fighters gain bonus Health, and gain Attack Damage and Ability Power every second up to @MaxStacks@ stacks. At max stacks deal bonus true damage.

name: The Champ
desc: The Champ's victories against players grant @PorosPerVictory@ Poro-fans! On loss Poro-fans prevent @PlayerDamagePrevented@ Tactician damage each, then you lose @PctPorosLost@% of your fans.

name: Sorcerer
desc: When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

name: Monster Trainer
desc: Choose which monster Lulu summons to replace her in combat! It gains XP after each combat and bonus XP for each takedown it participates in.

When your Monster levels up, it gains <TFTBonus>@HealthGainPerLevel*100@% Health</TFTBonus>. At level <TFTBonus>@FirstEvolveLevel@</TFTBonus> and <TFTBonus>@SecondEvolveLevel@</TFTBonus> its spell evolves!

name: Juggernaut
desc: Juggernauts gain Durability, increased above @HealthBreakpoint*100@% health. When a Juggernaut dies, other Juggernauts heal for @HealRatio*100@% of their max Health.

name: Rosemother
desc: Gain @1Star@/@2Star@/@3Star@ placeable plants, based on Zyra's star level. Plants in the front two rows grow into durable Grasping Roots, while plants in the back two rows grow into Deadly Spines.
Rosemother plants benefit from Zyra's Ability Power and Attack Speed.
When Zyra casts, her plant restores @BonusHealthAndAS*100@% Health and gains @BonusHealthAndAS*100@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat. If the plant is dead, she revives it instead.

name: Rogue Captain
desc: Twisted Fate upgrades the Crew Ship to deal @Bounty_TheCrew_RocketUpgrade_TrueDamagePercent*100@% of it's damage as true damage and draws Bounty Cards each round that grant random rewards.
<rules>Bounty Cards get better for each player combat. (Rounds Fielded: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Trait_RogueCaptain_Bounty_NumRoundsLeft@)</rules>

name: Mentor
desc: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Mentors.
<tftActiveRank enabled=TFT15_Trait_OldMentor_SpellsUpgraded><row>(4) Mentors gain all bonuses and upgrade their abilities. Other allies gain nothing.</row></tftActiveRank>
<TFTGuildActive enabled=TFT15_Trait_OldMentor_ActiveUdyr alternate=TFTGuildInactive>Udyr: @ADAP*100@% Attack Damage and Ability Power</TFTGuildActive>
<TFTGuildActive enabled=TFT15_Trait_OldMentor_ActiveRyze alternate=TFTGuildInactive>Ryze: Attacks grant @Mana@ bonus Mana</TFTGuildActive>

name: Duelist
desc: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times.

name: Strategist
desc: Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Damage Amp. Strategists gain triple.

name: Bastion
desc: Your team gains @TeamwideResists@ Armor and Magic Resist.
Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first @Duration@ seconds of combat.

name: Wraith
desc: Every @RealmTimer@ seconds, the Shadow Realm strikes the @NumEnemy@ closest enemies, dealing total magic damage equal to a portion of damage dealt by Wraiths since the last trigger.
Your lowest health Wraith heals for @HealPercent*100@% of damage dealt by Wraiths and the Shadow Realm.

name: Prodigy
desc: Your team gains Mana Regen. Prodigies gain more.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @TeamBonusMana@ %i:TFTManaRegen% | @ProdigyBonusMana@ %i:TFTManaRegen% | Prodigy abilities heal an ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of the damage dealt.</row>

name: Protector
desc: Once per combat at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, Protectors shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their maximum Health. Shields stack.

name: Battle Academia
desc: Battle Academia champions upgrade their abilities and gain Potential %i:set14AmpIcon%. Potential improves their abilities.
<rules>Prismatic: Field 7, then earn @PrismaticItemRequirement@ points by using items.</rules>

<TFTRadiantItemBonus>Prismatic:</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Earn 1 point for every Completed item used in combat. Graduate at @PrismaticItemRequirement@ points. (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_BattleAcademia_PrismaticNumItems@/@PrismaticItemRequirement@).

name: Luchador
desc: At @HealthRatio*100@% health, Luchadors cleanse negative effects, heal, and leap back into the fight, <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> enemies in a 1-hex radius for @StunDuration@ seconds.

name: Mighty Mech
desc: Gain The Mighty Mech. Mighty Mechs heal it for @GalioHealRatio*100@% of the damage they deal.
<rules>Each Mighty Mech champion's star level increases The Mighty Mech's power.</rules>
